A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Questionally whether this was a cash grab for Disney\, the film while providing some good moments\, thrills and action scenes\, The Last Jedi feels like a nostalgic copy and paste of the original trilogy's the empire strikes back.\nIt also introduces new characters but they feel underdeveloped and seem to not tie with the original cast\, and every conflict feels like it's been forced to bring to the similar conclusion of the story. \nIt's too much of the same thing\, just modernised
